articles.title: Nearly 13% of participants in an African cohort maintain HIV control off treatment - aidsmap
articles.description: Of over four thousand South African and Zambian participants with HIV who provided samples, nearly a quarter were off treatment and 13% of the latter were found to control the virus. Women were twice as likely to be controllers, while other demographic charac…
